professionalSummary: Automated testing professional and independent developer based in Bogotá, Colombia. Extensive experience in QA, QA Automation, and DevOps practices. Highly skilled in software testing, test automation, database management, and Fullstack web development. Proficient in multiple programming languages and modern development tools.

experience.description: Leading automated testing initiatives with focus on efficient time management and continuous integration. Responsible for developing and maintaining test automation frameworks, executing functional and non-functional testing, and implementing quality assurance processes in agile environments.
responsibilities: Design and implement automated test suites for web and API applications
Develop test automation frameworks using industry-standard tools
Execute functional, regression, and performance testing
Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines
Collaborate with development teams to ensure quality standards

experience.description: Performed comprehensive manual testing activities including functional, regression, and user acceptance testing. Developed detailed test cases, executed test plans, and reported defects with clear documentation. Worked closely with development teams in agile environments to ensure high-quality software delivery.
responsibilities: Develop and execute detailed test cases and test plans
Perform functional, regression, and user acceptance testing
Identify, document, and track software defects
Participate in requirements analysis and test design reviews
Create test documentation and bug reports
Collaborate with cross-functional teams in agile sprints

experience.description: Managed database operations and business intelligence solutions for large-scale financial technology companies. Developed complex SQL queries, data models, and reporting solutions handling millions of records.
responsibilities: Database installation, management, and optimization
Complex SQL query development and optimization
Data modeling and database design
Business intelligence report creation and maintenance
Data analysis and insights generation

experience.description: Developed data visualization solutions and ETL processes for large companies processing high data volumes with millions of monthly records using advanced BI tools.
responsibilities: Create data visualization dashboards and reports
Develop and maintain ETL processes
Manage large-scale data processing pipelines
Generate insights from quantitative data analysis
